_header: In May it merryeth when it dawes
Subjects: women, warnings to; men, treachery of
_description: On Women: a Defence and a Warning — four 12-line stanzas

BLHar2253.First Lines:
In May hit murgeþ when hit dawesIn dounes wiþ þis
                    dueres plawes…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Yhere leuely lores mynWiþ selþe we weren
                    sahte
